channel.description: Recent content in Damienbod.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Add a Swagger UI using a .NET 9 Json OpenAPI file
item.description: This post shows how to implement a Swagger UI using a .NET 9 produced OpenAPI file. The Swagger UI is deployed to a secure or development environment and is not deployed to a public production target. Sometimes, it is required to deploy the Swagger UI to a development deployment target and not the test or […] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/08/12/add-a-swagger-ui-using-a-net-9-json-openapi-file/

item.title: Implementing an ASP.NET Core API with .NET 9 and OpenAPI
item.description: This post implements a basic ASP.NET Core API using .NET 9 and the Microsoft OpenAPI implementation. The OpenAPI Nuget package supports both Controller based APIs and minimal APIs. Until now, we used excellent solutions like NSwag to produce the API schemas which can be used to auto-generate client code. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/WebApiOpenApi Setup A .NET 9 […] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/08/06/implementing-an-asp-net-core-api-with-net-9-and-openapi/
